text: The Mini Estadi (English: Mini Stadium) is the home stadium of FC Barcelona B, officially named "Miniestadi", the reserve team of FC Barcelona. It is in Barcelona, Spain. It can hold 15,276 people. It also hosts games for the FC Barcelona women's team. ==Related pages== * Camp Nou * FC Barcelona * Barcelona == References == Category:Football stadiums in Spain Category:Buildings and structures in Barcelona
title: Mini Estadi
